filename: Kom ons wandel in die lig van God ML (Vonkk 83)
title: VONKK 83
lyrics: VONKK 83
Siyahamba / Kom Ons Wandel In Die Lig Van God
Si - ya - hamb' - e-ku-kha-nyen'kwe-nKos'. Si - ya-hamb' e-ku-kha-nyen' kwe-nKos'.
Komons wan - del in die lig van God. Kom ons wan-del in die lig van God.
We are march - ing in the light of God. We are march-ing in the light of God.
Si - ya - hamb' - e-ku-kha-nyen'kwe-nKos'. Si - ya-hamb' e-ku-kha-nyen' kwe-nKos'.
Komons wan - del in die lig van God. Kom ons wan-del in die lig van God.
We are march - ing in the light of God. We are march-ing in the light of God.
Oe 3
Si - ya - ham-ba, si-ya - ham-ba, si-ya-hamb' e - ku-kha-nyen'kwe-nKos'.
Komons wan-del, komons wan-del, komons wan-del in die lig van God.
We are march-ing, we are march-ing, we are march-ing in the light of God.
Oe
Si - ya-ham - ba, si -ya-ham - ba, si - ya-hamb' e-ku-kha-nyen' kwe - nKos'.
Komons wan- del, komons wan- del, komons wan-del in die lig van God.
We aremarch- ing, we aremarch- ing, we aremarch-ing in the light of God.
Johannes 12:25 en Jesaja 2:5
Teks: Tradisioneel Suid-Afrika (isiZulu); Afrikaanse weergawe Werkgroep VONKK 2009;
Engelse teks oorgelewer
Melodie: SIYAHAMBA – tradisioneel Suid-Afrika
RUBRIEK: Multikultureel – Liefde, Dankbaarheid en Diens
chords: G D7 G C D G
G D7 G C D G G
C G C D G G7
